column1: 1) STORES.CSV:- This File Contains Anonymized Information About The 45 Stores
column2: Indicating The Type And Size Of Store.

column1: 2) TRAIN.CSV:- This Is The Historical Training Data
3) TEST.CSV:- This File Is Identical To Train.csv
column2: Except We Have Withheld The Weekly Sales. You Must Predict The Sales For Each Triplet Of Store

column1: 4) FEATURES.CSV:- This File Contains Additional Data Related To The Store
column3: And Regional Activity For The Given Dates.
